name: Mechanicum
description:
The spirit of the machine has taken over the Mechanatum. Many are dead! Stop it, before it takes over the rest of the sanctum!

You have also been afflicted, but you can still save the planet!

How to Play

Made for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020 - Theme "Out Of Control"

This is an FPS game where you must always walk forward ("Out of Control")

  • W to walk faster, S to walk slower
  • Mouse Wheel to switch weapons
  • Double Jump to double jump
  • Left click to shoot
